concept: Basic concepts of computer networks, benefits, and broad classification of networks.

challenges.title: Q1: What is a Computer Network?
challenges.description: A computer network is best described as:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
 a) A single computer with multiple users
 b) A collection of interconnected computers that can share resources
 c) A special type of high-speed printer
 d) A backup device for storing files

challenges.title: Q2: Network Advantages
challenges.description: Which of the following is NOT typically an advantage of using a computer network?
examples:
Options:
 a) Resource sharing
 b) Easy communication
 c) Centralized data management
 d) Complete elimination of security risks

challenges.title: Q3: LAN Expansion
challenges.description: A Local Area Network (LAN) typically covers:
examples:
Options:
 a) A whole country
 b) A small geographical area like a building or campus
 c) The entire Internet
 d) A connection between two continents

challenges.title: Q4: WAN Example
challenges.description: Which of the following is the best example of a Wide Area Network (WAN)?
examples:
Options:
 a) Network inside a college lab
 b) Network inside a single office floor
 c) Interconnection of branch offices of a company across different cities
 d) Connection of two PCs using a crossover cable only

challenges.title: Q5: Internet vs Intranet
challenges.description: Which statement about intranet is TRUE?
examples:
Options:
 a) Intranet is a global public network
 b) Intranet is a private network used within an organization
 c) Intranet and Internet are the same
 d) Intranet can only exist without using TCP/IP
